resources.string: \t\t\t Simple Enemy are the one that caveman can kill using the axe.
\t\t\t Jumping Enemy are the one that caveman cannot kill using the axe.

\t\t\t The game is very simple. Basically, when we select the level, we are directed to the corresponding level. Now the axe is with caveman, and with the use of axe, we need to kill the simple enemy (in red color). The player just need to touh the top of caveman and drag the axe towards the enemy, and as the axe touches the Simple Enemy, the got killed and score increases respectively.
4.) Where is the Level Score visible?
\t\t\t The Level Score is visible at the top left corner for each level.
5.) How much points we get on killing a Simple Enemy?
\t\t\t Killing one simple gives you 10 extra points.
6.) What to do when particular level finishes?

\t\t\t The message of GAME OVER! will be visible on screen when particular level finishes, If you want to play next level , touch anywhere on the screen. else press the back key and you will be directed to the menu page.
